Package pokerapp.view.playerhand

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PlayerHandViewActionListener
    Holds actions that user has performed in GUI: hold and exchange.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ComputerHandView
    Sets up the CPU's hand for how it will display onscreen
    PlayerHandPresenter
    PlayerHand presenter MVP pattern: presenter will communicate actions from and to pokerapp.view
    PlayerHandPresenterBridge
    Bridge pattern for the display of the presenters hand TODO: why is this implementing the bridge pattern
    PlayerHandView
    To collect together the displayable elements of the player in the game, so that the MVP pattern can communicate most easily
    TurnCompletedEvent
    Detailed explanation of the class and its collaborators.
